sentences.sContent: Our team was eliminated in the first round.
sentences.sCn: 我们队第一轮就被淘汰了。

sentences.sContent: ...it may be difficult to completely eliminate bias...
...be prepared to do what may be required to eliminate hazards to those you want to befriend...
...it announced it would eliminate loans for needy students and cap them for middle-income families...

remMethod.val: e(出) ＋ limin(看作limit， 界限) ＋ ate(做) → 划出界线之外 → 消除， 排除

trans.tranCn: 消灭， 消除， 排除； 淘汰
trans.tranOther: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted
